meanings.definition: A yellow dye obtained from the wood of a tropical American tree.
meanings.sent1: The artist used fustic to create a vibrant yellow hue in the painting.
meanings.sent2: The fustic dye added a beautiful golden color to the fabric.
meanings.sent3: When the clumsy painter spilled fustic on the floor, it turned into a bright mess.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as fustic, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The fustic dye transformed the plain cloth into a sunny masterpiece.

meanings.definition: A small tree or shrub of the sumac family, native to tropical America.
meanings.sent1: The fustic in the garden provided shade on hot summer days.
meanings.sent2: Birds nested in the branches of the fustic tree.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel played hide-and-seek around the fustic shrub.
meanings.sent4: The fustic tree stood tall like a guardian in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the fustic plant filled the air with a sweet scent.
